newsitem.title: USA: Bassett says names two top executives.
newsitem.headline: Bassett says names two top executives.

text.p: Bassett Furniture said Wednesday Robert Spillman was promoted to president and chief operating officer, and Paul Fulton was appointed chairman and chief executive.
The company said Spillman's appointment is effective immediately, and Fulton's appoinment is effective August 1.
The company said Fulton is replacing Glenn Hunsucker, who is retiring to pursue investment opportunities in the Basset Furniture Direct area.
Fulton replaces Robert Spillman, who is also retiring.
The company said Spillman Jr. was previously executive vice president of marketing and merchandising.
The company said Fulton has been a member of the board of directors and audit committee since 1993.
